remarks.format:
## Remarks An <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> must cycle through its <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> in this order: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState.On>, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState.Off> and, if supported, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState.Indeterminate>.
## Examples In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns a collection of automation elements that are descendants of the root and satisfy a set of property conditions.
[!code-csharp[UIATogglePattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATogglePattern_snip/CSharp/UIATogglePattern_snippets.cs#100)] [!code-vb[UIATogglePattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATogglePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATogglePattern_snippets.vb#100)]
